Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The restaurant was quite busy late on Friday evening so we couldn't get a table inside the restaurant. They accommodated us so we could eat dinner in the library salon downstairs which had a nice ambiance to it. We ordered Cod fish, duck …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: An amazing culinary experience in the heart of Amsterdam. Fine dining done right. Excellent service and fabulous food. You can have 3 course menu or go a la carte. Unique dishes that are very well done

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Superb food with an amazing service and a true eye for detail. What a divine experience! The duck was extremely well cooked and they have a truly surprising wine selection.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: This was the first restaurant we went to and it was excellent. The presentation of the food was a small art masterpiece and so was the taste. Meat and fish were prepared to perfection and the different garnishments complemented ideally. If you are looking for a high class bit not too expensive restaurant this might be the place.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
Nice location, very nice staff.
The food is average with limited choice. …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Second time coming here after 3 years. We had a lovely table at the canal. The service by the staff (I think our waiters name was Ahmed according to the bill) was excellent. The food and drinks were very good again. …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Excellent food, cozy atmosphere and great service. Recommend to visit!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: It’s delighted to have some drinks here on a rainy night. The bar is small but cozy.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The food was fantastic! I really enjoyed the soup and the risotto. The staff members were attentive and very friendly, the restaurant also has a very cozy vibe. It’s not like one of those fine dining places that you would need to do …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: It is a very nice French restaurant, recommended by a French people. I like the long piece of bread with butter. The appetizer， I love the toast with the tuna mud(I guess). The main dish, fish steak, looks so beautiful. The soup is …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Had a great time there, with a friendly service and nice location. The dessert was not nice though, I regretted to ordered it. Tasted a bit old and something so tough that I didn't want to eat that. I also encountered a small piece of plastic in the middle. My previous time was much better experience than today's. Pity.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: It is a very nice French restaurant, recommended by a French people. I like the long piece of bread with butter. The appetizer， I love the toast with the tuna mud(I guess). The main dish, fish steak, looks so beautiful. The soup is …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: I went with my family to have lunch. Beautiful place, well decorated. Staff very friendly and efficient. The starter was very well prepared, good wine but unfortunately the dessert was much less than expected. Bad textures, wrong tastes, and the worst, the plate came with the taste of detergent. Terrible mistakes! Please review it!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: As expected, excellent service and knowledgeable staff. Delicious food and would come back again. Overall a classic fine dining experience.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Gorgeous place, lovely seating. Huge portions, lovely staff. Gorgeous inside but also beautiful seating by the canal. We tried the three course menu. I tried the snails, the burger, my friend tried the salad and the ravioli and we got a set of cakes, everything was perfect! Also amazing cocktails

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: What an outstanding meal! We were staying in the hotel for four days, so we had to try the restaurant on site at least one of those days. I'm always a bit wary to try hotel restaurants at places I'm staying, but I can say this without a …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The food was fantastic! I really enjoyed the soup and the risotto. The staff members were attentive and very friendly, the restaurant also has a very cozy vibe. It’s not like one of those fine dining places that you would need to do …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
The place is beautiful and cozy with a lot of paintings! The feeling is that you are having dinner in a nice art gallery.
The service was fantastic and the food was excellent, served in a fair size portion.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Wonderful meal and setting. We were in the small dining room to the left as you come in the door. The crisp white walls allow the bright and vibrant colors of the artwork to pop. All this set against the backdrop of large windows over …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Super service and excellent food. The price is reasonable so all in all you could do much worse.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Really enjoyed my evening at Brasserie Ambassade. I had a 4 course menu and it all tasted really good. It does not seem like a place where many locals shows up, so an international audience should be expected. However for me it was definitely worth a visit and I would very much enjoy coming back in the near future!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: As expected, excellent service and knowledgeable staff. Delicious food and would come back again. Overall a classic fine dining experience.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Gorgeous place, lovely seating. Huge portions, lovely staff. Gorgeous inside but also beautiful seating by the canal. We tried the three course menu. Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
The place is beautiful and cozy with a lot of paintings! The feeling is that you are having dinner in a nice art gallery.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Amazing fine dining food, place, interior design and the staff very helpful. I ordered snails, steak and chocolate for the dessert.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We booked for our 1st wedding anniversary and the staff made us feel welcomed and cared for. We were sat at a window table to enjoy the beautiful view out onto the canal. …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The service was excellent! All of the wait staff was so kind and helpful. The food was also delicious! I can recommend the sirloin steak and orange crepe for dessert. And definitely don't pass up on the bread and butter at the beginning of the meal!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Fine dining at its best with superb service and a very nice wine selection. The Duck signature dish is an excellent choice to try. Definitely recommended.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Amazing food and exceptional service.. would diffinately return. Occasion was my husband's birthday. We had a Really lovely wine from Holland

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Nice and calm place. Good service and friendly the dishes was good but very small and Not satisfying compared to the big price . Romantic

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We had a wonderful evening.  The cote de boeuf was scrumptious.  I asked the waiter if I could take the bone home for the little Jack Russel and he gallantly allowed me to do so, even though, culturally speaking this is "not done"... but done anyway!  How kind.  needless to say the JRT was super happy with his evening gift.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: well executed meal. the fish was very delicious and the foie gras never disappointed. would definitely come back!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: An absolutely classy restaurant where you may feel the passion. Nice atmosphere and prices correct for the high quality.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Super service and excellent food. The price is reasonable so all in all you could do much worse.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Awesome and quiet environment, wonderful and tasty food, and service is equisite. Went with my partner for our anniversary and they made us feel really special the whole night. Thank you very much.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Food is nice but service is underwhelming. It feels like they’re in a rush to have you out of there, no personal touch.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We have got a new favorite restaurant since tonight, the food was excellent, the service was excellent and the location was excellent and last but not least the price was excellent in comparison with what we got. If you want a nice fancy …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Loved the atmosphere, service and interior. Food was good but the portion is a bit small. Cocktails are not recommended though.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: When you think of a good dinner you don't always think of a "brasserie". I went her on a date night with my wife and we had a table right next to the window which had a canal view. The restaurant is beautifully decorated with "Cobra" art …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Whoever looks for a healthy food or tasty meals so you are in the right place.. I was impressed with the various tea options before I start my day with a breakfast from the open-buffet.. the continental breakfast was also something very …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Great place. Tasty food: startets and main courses were delicious and well portioned. Friendly and professional waiters. I would definitely go back there.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Great food, very tasty. Very nice and welcoming crew!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Absolutely perfect. Elegant but not overly so. Inspired food. And actually not very expensive. A really good experience.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Loved it here, really cute atmosphere (try get a window seat). Great food and loved the ladybird wine from South Africa.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Delicious French food and excellent service. Highly recommend.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The food was cooked perfectly, very good staff, nice location also. If I return to Amsterdam I will go to this restaurant.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Excellent food and service in a cosy, romantic place. Would love to go back :-)

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Nice and classic dining experience. Stuff are professional. High quality food but portion on the smaller size.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: If there ever was a perfect restaurant in Amsterdam this has to be it. The Dutch food scene is horrible and service makes you want to hide under the table - but this place puts every other fine dining to shame. The food is fantastic and people are kind. Just perfect and will come back here again!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Excellent food and service. The 4 course menu is delicious. Great option for dinner

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Very delicious food, the service was very attentive and friendly. Would come back here again!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Both the service and the food were exceptional. The fixed menu and a la carte were equally delicious.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: All the food and drinks here were fantastic. It's a very classy, high end place, with perfectly reasonable prices. Definitely worth checking out for drinks or dinner.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Reasonably priced, breathtaking views of Amsterdam canal in the early hours

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: I had take out and I have to say it was very impressive. Everything was packaged perfectly so that the dish would come together well once unpacked. …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: I had the most civilised of lunches in the dining room of a delicious salmon served by an incredibly lovely staff. I very much look forward to my next meal in the restaurant. It is excellent, a lovely room and very well priced given the great food, exceptional service and incredible location / romantic setting.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Very pleased to have found this place. Great menu with many of our favourite, food very well prepared and presented, an impressive wine list, great service. Our waiter knew a great deal about all the wines. Altogether a wonderful evening. Will definitely try to eat there again.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Amazing food and fine dining atmosphere

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
This is one of the best restaurants I have ever been to. Great tasting food, great location (right next to a gracht), kind as well as welcoming service.
I would definitely recommend spending an evening here!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Delicious food & top quality service. Thank you Sergio!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Very tasty dishes served in well laid out dishes, polite waiters and great location by the Herengracht canal... Perfect for a calm lunch

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Review Text:

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
Great restaurant in a beautiful location. The staff is extremely polite and professional. I ate well, and came back two days later for more. Fair prices.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Beautiful atmosphere paired with mediocre French cuisine and horrible service. The staff has worse ego than most michelin star restaurants.... without the food quality. Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
Just excellent food and service all the way through.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Great food ! Service on the highest level ! Good prices.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Perfect service, environment and food at affordable price. So glad I choose this restaurant.

Review Text:
We had a lovely experience here.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Been there the second time. The restaurant never disappointed me. The food is prepared with care and patience. The first class serving group. You don’t like the cocktail? Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Review Text: Excellent service and great buffet breakfast to start the day

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: I had a the house made bisque, the salmon tartare and selection of cheeses : it was excellent, I really enjoyed my moment at the Brasserie. Waiters polite, well done service. Thank you! Will be back in the future.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Wonderful lunch, great service!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Most probably one of the best table of Amsterdam. Service is fast and discreet, food is of very high quality and the sommelier is here to help you pick a great matching wine. All in all it is a great experience!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Hotel restaurant open on Mondays, hence my reason for going, but what a superb lunch. Some of the best, perfectly presented, fat, creamy, fresh oysters imaginable and followed by very fine mushroom ravioli.  It is refreshing to see a …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We started the evening waiting for our table in the downstairs library where we enjoyed a glass of wine some cheese and shared a game of backgammon. A lovely way to start the evening. When the table was ready we went upstairs to a very …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We had a fab dinner at a great location in Amsterdam. The restaurant has beautiful museum/art pieces hanging on the wall. The food was excellent and I remember the waiter was very friendly and helpful. We were on a weekend trip to Amsterdam …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: My partner and I had a fantastic meal here! We both went with the chefs menu which was very reasonably priced, neither of us was disappointed! The quality of the food and service were impeccable. And the ambience and setting complimented it all beautifully.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: This restaurant is really well situated, with a really nice staff that is present when needed. The food is quite good but to be honest, it is a bit expensive for the culinary level. I believe it is pretty much the same everywhere in Amsterdam but still. Feels a bit overpriced. But a good experience nonetheless

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text:
High standard and quality restaurant. We live in Amsterdam so we have seen other places and I don’t think it is pricey as I have read in other comments.
The food is delicious , the service is perfect , love it. It became our favorite …

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, and the food is really delicious. Kind of modern french cuisine, with good choice of wine (ask for advice if not sure, staff really know what to recommend!)

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Fantastic cote de boeuf delivered to our door... incredible quality, can't wait to visit after lockdown restrictions are lifted..Thank you

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The size of the portions, the quality and the price, you won’t find a better place in Amsterdam! We ordered 5 dishes and all were very good.. service was good.. if I visit Amsterdam again I will be coming bk to this place

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: great food and great service.

Review Text: Outstanding place, every member of our company loved it. I tasted delecius raviolli out there. Also can recommend creme brulee. And you can play chess & checkers & cards downstairs. And damn friendly barman.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Portion was a bit small,but the taste is good.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Food was excellent, service was sub par as server forgot to put in our order and blamed on the kitchen.  We got the air quotes telling us our order fell between the cracks.  This is the crack, we got the apps then 1 hour later after an excuse got our entree.  Sub par service will not be back.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Delicious meals and great service.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Everything was perfect! The food, the wine and the service. Our waiter Sergio was delightful. I am coming back and already looking forward to it! Best wishes from Iceland!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: The one restaurant in Amsterdam that always delivers perfection. Service is at a non-Dutch level - impeccable. Have been coming here many times and never disappointed.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Food was pretty good and they were accommodating of gluten free requests. That said, portions were fine dining sized but not fine dining quality.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: It was an exquisite meal in a beautiful dining room. I was well taken care of by a highly professional and knowledgeable wait staff. It is a place I highly recommend and will return to in the future.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Great, upscale dining but not stuffy. We got the chefs tasting menu and everything was delicious. Highly recommend!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Amazing food, Fantastic service, would highly recommend this restaurant. I've been to some top restaurants before but this, considering it doesn't have a michelin star is one of the best. I would go back to Amsterdam again just to eat here!

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: We've just moved here from Australia and celebrated our 10th anniversary, this restaurant and staff were amazing, food atmosphere perfect. Its our new favourite and we will be back.Yelmer our waiter was lovely and so friendly.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Very nice experience. The food is always very good and the wine selection is fantastic. Beautiful location in the heart Amsterdam with affordable prices.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Fantastic place with good selection of wines and tasty food. The staff is very kind and helpful. Great place for a date.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Best restaurant, best service! Thanks for this amazing experience! The hotel is amazing as well. We spent 3 night here.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Amazing service, great atmosphere.

Name: Brasserie Ambassade

Name: Brasserie Ambassade
Review Text: Heerlijk gegeten met mijn gezin. Heel goede brasserie met een erg mooi en gezellig interieur. Heel goede service envriendelijk personeel. Mooie wijnkaart met iets te kiezen voor iedereen. Zelfs mijn twee kinderen vonden het erg lekker en dat zegt wat want die komen meestal niet verder dan het eetcafe
